commit message: Use the correct blogID when update stats.

Add logging lines

Merge pull request #1358 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1356-batch-calls-issue

Fixed an issue where stats weren't being tracked by analytics.
Make sure the activity is NOT destroyed when trying to show the notification details screen.
Make sure the correct wpcom account name is shown when verify credentials fails on Jetpack blog
Read the wpcom credentials stored at blog settings, and fallback to the global wpcom credentials when verify credentials for Jetpack powered blog

fix #1362 themetabfragment constructor
Make sure batch requests work fine in AuthenticatorRequest. This is the real fix for #1350
Make sure isDestroyed is called on API 17+, and make sure super.onCreate is not called with null parameter in CommentsActivity and NotificationsActivity.
Remove the call to isDestroyed that is not needed
Move isDestroyed() to a separate routine
